name: KNS: The Last Ramen Announcement
description:
為了讓我們的忠實持有者們能夠領取周邊

我們設計了【平民鎖倉】的機制

🍜 時間：在 2022/4/30 21:00 - 2022/5/30 21:00 的一個月期間，滿足以下條件

1️⃣ 取消在二級市場的武士標價

2️⃣ 將武士標價高於或等於 0.075e

🍜 內容：每隻武士都能獲得一張抽獎券，可用於我們的實體周邊抽獎



In order to allow our loyal fans to receive merch.

We came up with the mechanism of [Civilian Lock Position].

🍜Time: During the month from 2022/4/30 21:00 to 2022/5/30 21:00! If the following conditions are met.

1️⃣Cancel listing of your samurai.

2️⃣ The listing price of your samurai may be equal to or higher than 0.075e.

🍜 Prize: Every samurai can get one lottery ticket for merch.
